lead_paragraph: The wife of slain former New Orleans Saints player Will Smith said Friday that the defensive end's zest for life and refusal to accept failure has guided her recovery from the physical and emotional wounds she suffered on the night her "worst fear came true."

headline.print_headline: Wife of Late Will Smith Speaks at Saints HOF Induction
headline.main: Wife of Late Will Smith Speaks at Saints HOF Induction
